### Industry

We offer a 3-months free FACTS Evaluation License to showcase the power and features of our FACTS simulation tool. Please [contact us](contact.qmd) to learn more about this offer or our regular licenses.

### Academia / Research Institutions / Charities

To academic and other non-profit research institutions, we will generally offer a free FACTS license under certain conditions. Please [contact us](contact.qmd) to see if your organization qualifies.
